data.title: Groningen Europapark → Weener by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Groningen Europapark to Weener in 1h 4m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Groningen Europapark to Weener today.
data.text:
Want to travel from Groningen Europapark to Weener by train? Start your journey with us.

The train from Groningen Europapark to Weener usually takes 1 hour 18 minutes on average to travel 32 miles (51 km), although the quickest services can take as little as 1 hour 4 minutes. You can expect to find 25 trains per day running on this popular route. As there aren’t any direct services running between Groningen Europapark and Weener, you’ll need to make 1 change on your way to Weener. DB are the main train operator on this route and will whisk you to Weener in no time.

To help you get the best train deals, we'll highlight the cheapest train ticket prices from Groningen Europapark to Weener in our Journey Planner. Just remember, the sooner you book your tickets, the more you'll save!

Keep reading for more information about the train journey to Weener, including FAQs, timetables with first and last train times and tips on booking cheap train tickets. If you’re ready to book, just start a search for tickets with us today.
